acf.description: We have won the Deloitte Fast 50 award for the fastest growing company in Central and Eastern Europe and we are looking for new colleagues to take our project forward with us! Take advantage of the opportunity and become part of the fast growing startup FTMO.com.

expectations.title: You will create videos in English
As a content ambassador, you will play a key role in shaping and enhancing our FTMO brand
You will be an icon of our project, representing yourself and FTMO
You are a versatile content creator and will have access to both a photographer and a video editor. Your work will primarily focus on social media (Stories, Reels, TikTok, YouTube)

knowledge.title: Excellent presentation and verbal communication skills in perfect English and with no ballast accent
You are not afraid to stand in front of the camera and be a star
Previous experience as an influencer or YouTuber is welcome
You enjoy following new trends on social media and in the world of design
Experience in financial markets and trading is a big advantage
